short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your YouTube™ experience by filtering out unwanted video recommendations based on phrases in video titles or channel names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tailor your feed by excluding videos and Shorts based on specific phrases in titles or channel names, ensuring only content that interests you makes it to your screen. ZenModeTube focuses on filtering standard videos and Shorts. It does not block advertisements.

Key Features:
- Custom Filtering: Easily hide unwanted videos by specifying phrases found in video titles or channel names.
- Comprehensive Coverage: Works across YouTube™, including home, search results, recommendations sidebar, video end screens, and more.
- Shorts Consideration: Filters out Shorts based on title phrases. Channel names in Shorts are typically not displayed and thus not used for filtering.
- Privacy-Focused: Operates entirely locally with no data transmission. Your preferences stay on your device.

Enjoy a cleaner, more focused YouTube™ without the clutter of irrelevant content. With ZenModeTube, your viewing preferences are in your control, crafting a YouTube™ experience that's uniquely yours.
